es.uvigo.ei.sing.bew.constants

Class FunctionConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uvigo.ei.sing.bew.constants.FunctionConstants

  • public final class FunctionConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static functions of different types at other system classes.
    Author:
    Gael Pérez Rodríguez

      • setAIBenchValues

        public static void setAIBenchValues(java.util.List<WizardStep> sheetConfigurators,
                    java.lang.String[] methodNames,
                    java.lang.String[] methodUnits,
                    java.lang.Integer[] numConditions,
                    java.lang.String[][] conditionNames,
                    java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Object[][]> data,
                    java.lang.String[] expSetup)
        Method to prepare the values for AIBench. The method get the data of sheetConfigurators and fill the other variables with them.
        Parameters:
        sheetConfigurators - The Sheets with the information.
        methodNames - The names of the different methods.
        methodUnits - Units of the different methods.
        numConditions - Condition number of each method.
        conditionNames - Condition names of each method.
        data - Data of each method.
        expSetup - Experiment setup values.
